movie_title: MOTIVATIONAL SPEECH | FACING FEAR: Overcoming Obstacles (English Subtitles)
introduction: In this empowering motivational speech, we dive deep into the journey of overcoming fear and embraci

vocabulary.definition: the action of pausing or hesitating before saying or doing something
vocabulary.example: She spoke without hesitation, clearly and confidently.

vocabulary.definition: to make someone unable to think or act normally, especially through fear or shock
vocabulary.example: The sudden news seemed to paralyze him with disbelief.

vocabulary.definition: a strong desire to do or achieve something, typically requiring determination and hard work
vocabulary.example: Her ambition to become a successful entrepreneur drove her to work tirelessly.
After some reflection, he decided to pursue a different career path.
Winning the championship was a triumph for the team after years of hard work.

vocabulary.definition: the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness
vocabulary.example: Her resilience in the face of adversity inspired those around her.
